content.description: Tim decided he needed to lose some weight. He started dieting, but he was experiencing uncomfortable feelings of hunger when he fasted for several hours. He then began eating several small meals over the course of a day and stopped experiencing feelings of hunger.
content.question: Which of the following concepts best explains why Tim was not able to maintain fasting as a part of his diet strategy?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
